Experience life with luxury amenities, serene surroundings and more convenience than ever before. Each Hobart Crossing apartment home brings a refined, contemporary feel and is directly connected to the development’s amenities.

Wonderful place to live!

We have lived at Hobart Crossing since 2017 and would not consider living anywhere else. The buildings are immaculate and incredibly maintained. Our unit is incredibly quiet, and we never hear our neighbors. The manger is wonderful and maintenance requests (which are few) are handled promptly and efficiently. The units are incredibly efficient for heat and air conditioning. The location is easy access to pretty much everything. We LOVE it here.

Worth the Price!

These apartments are immaculate! If you are looking for a quiet, luxury apartment these are the perfect fit for you! We absolutely love our one bedroom 3rd floor unit, and the layout makes the 800 sq ft feel much larger. Our hall is very quiet, and the units are built very well so sound does not carry. The people are very friendly, and quiet as well making this a GREAT place to live. Also, Betsy is fantastic!

Love my apartment

I have lived at Hobart Crossing for a year and a half. It is my first apartment and it feels like a home. I can host my children, family and friends comfortably. The kitchen island is perfect for food prep, eating and I even use it to lay out my sewing! The pool is wonderful in the summer. I have met some good friends and recommend Hobart Crossing.

About Hobart Crossing

There’s an exciting place to call home in the greater Green Bay area, the area’s newest luxury leased residences, Hobart Crossing. Amenities include a large outdoor pool area with grills and lounging space, roomy fitness center outfitted with professional equipment and a spacious clubroom. Each apartment includes granite countertops, in-unit washer/dryer and upgraded appliances.
